Although wind speed and air humidity presented signiﬁcant reduction in shaded

not decrease the temperature signiﬁcantly, as observed in previous studies, where
). The temperature behavior in coﬀee systems studied here is related

tems SH1 and SH2 did not receive shade of the trees, having only a self-shadowing
of coﬀee trees, making it diﬃcult to attenuate the temperature.
